* エスケープシーケンス追加

* コマンド修正

* MIT LICENSEに修正

data.author: Shuhei Kozasa
data.message:
LiDARの追加 (#38)

* Update descriptions

* Adds stl data of multi LIDAR mount

* Adds xacro if for lds and rplidar.

* Adds macro lidar_multi_mount

* Adds macro lidar_multi_sensor

* Update README. Adds License description

* Adds stl file for LDS

* Update specs

* Update collision size

* Adjust positions

* Add colors

* Adds legs for LDS

* fix typo

* Adds lidar parameter to macro lidar_multi_sensor.

* Adds RPLIDAR thing

* Adds lidar parameter to macro lidar_multi_sensor

* Adds if statement. rplidar is to be added

* Update README

* Update file name

* Update links

* Update lidar macro

* update macro names

* Adds RPLIDAR macros

* Update specs for RPLIDAR

* Updates the position of LDS and the length of its legs

* Updates RPLIDAR's position

* Adds a command that displays the lidar mounted on the robot.

* Replace material color to black

* Adds leg visual macro for the lidars

* Remove comments

* Update urdf/raspimouse.urdf.xacro

Co-authored-by: Shota Aoki <s.aoki@rt-net.jp>

* Adjust the collision size and position of the LIDARs

* Remove comment

* Adjusts the size of the collision of the multi_lidar_mount

* Adjust the inertial position

* Adjust the inertial height of each LIDAR

* LiDARマウントの重心位置を修正

Co-authored-by: Shota Aoki <s.aoki@rt-net.jp>

data.author: Shota Aoki
data.message:
Merge master branch (ROS1) into ros2 branch (#37)

* Add lidar link rename option (#23)

* Fix slipping (#28)
* Update model and add RT Corporation logo (#29)
* Update tread (#31)
* Add a simple launch file to load robot description (#34)
* Support for launching multiple robots (#35)

Co-authored-by: Daisuke Sato <daisuke.sato@rt-net.jp>

data.author: Daisuke Sato
data.message:
Update Gazebo params (#22)

* Fix wheel link missing problem

Also, add comments about params

-wheelTorque: 5
+wheelTorque: 500

Co-authored-by: Shota Aoki <s.aoki@rt-net.jp>

* Fix typo to suppress warnings loading GazeboPlugin

same as https://github.com/rt-net/jnmouse_description/pull/9

* Fix default namespace to avoid odometry tf error

related: https://github.com/rt-net/raspimouse_sim/pull/55

* Refactor

* Add an option to load gazebo plugin to allow URDF to be loaded without gazebo_ros

* Separate DiffDriveController into separate files

* Define robotdescription namespace

Co-authored-by: Shota Aoki <s.aoki@rt-net.jp>
